text: Ilybius is a large genus of predatory aquatic beetles in the family Dytiscidae. The genus is native to the Palearctic (including Europe), the Near East, the Nearctic, and North Africa. 70 species has been described from this genus:Dytiscidae Species List at Joel Hallan's Biology Catalog. Texas A&M; University. Retrieved on 7 May 2012. * Ilybius aenescens Thomson, 1870 * Ilybius albarracinensis (Fery, 1986) * Ilybius angustior (Gyllenhal, 1808) * Ilybius anjarum Nilsson, 1999 * Ilybius apicalis Sharp, 1873 *
